windowclass.name: async_trigger
windowclass.script: function onInit() self.onMove = moveTrigger self.onSizeChanged = sizeTrigger end function moveTrigger() if AsyncLib.eventLoop() then setSize(math.random(1,100),math.random(1,100)) else close() end end function sizeTrigger() if AsyncLib.eventLoop() then setPosition(math.random(200,1000),math.random(200,1000)) else close() end end
